results.description: Kalidou Koulibaly scores his first two goals of the season as Napoli beat Chievo to make Juventus wait for the Serie A title.
results.title: Chievo 1-3 Napoli: Kalidou Koulibaly double keeps Juventus waiting

results.description: Emre Can scores his first goal for Juventus in their 3-0 win over Chievo - though Cristiano Ronaldo missed a penalty.
results.title: Emre Can: Juventus midfielder scores first goal for club as Cristiano Ronaldo misses penalty in win over Chievo

results.description: Cristiano Ronaldo makes a winning start to his Juventus career as they come from behind to beat Chievo 3-2 in a dramatic Serie A opener.
results.shortTitle: Ronaldo makes winning start at Juventus
results.title: Cristiano Ronaldo makes winning start as Juventus beat Chievo 3-2

results.description: Cristiano Ronaldo makes his competitive debut for Juventus as they beat Chievo in Serie A - follow live text commentary.
results.title: Cristiano Ronaldo debut: Chievo v Juventus in Serie A

results.description: Edin Dzeko strikes twice as Roma prepare for their Champions League semi-final second leg with a 4-1 win over Chievo.
results.title: Roma 4-1 Chievo

results.description: Napoli score two late goals to keep their Serie A title dreams alive with victory over Chievo.
results.title: Napoli 2-1 Chievo

results.description: Sami Khedira hits the winner as Juventus narrowly overcome nine-man Chievo to go two points clear at the top of Serie A.
results.title: Chievo 0-2 Juventus

thumbnail.altText: Sami Khedira celebrates scoring for Juventus against Chievo

results.description: Serie A bottom side Benevento secure their first league win of the season at the 19th attempt, beating Chievo 1-0.
results.shortTitle: Benevento secure first Serie A win
results.title: Benevento secure first league win of Serie A season at 19th attempt

results.description: Ivan Perisic scores a hat-trick as unbeaten Inter Milan go top of Serie A thanks to a comfortable win over mid-table Chievo.
results.title: Inter Milan 5-0 Chievo

results.description: Adel Taarabt is one of two Genoa players sent off in injury time after Inter Milan score a late winner.
results.title: Inter Milan 1-0 Genoa

results.description: Gonzalo Higuain scores twice as Juventus beat Chievo to move closer to a sixth consecutive Serie A title.
results.title: Juventus 2-0 Chievo

results.description: Marek Hamsik scores his 100th Napoli goal as they keep the pressure on Serie A leaders Juventus by beating Chievo.
results.title: Napoli 2-0 Chievo
